Effect / Reminder Text: Discard a Mecha with the same name as this Mecha: Gain control of all adjacent units.
When this Mecha enters the battlefield, gain control of all units you own.

Flight (This unit can't be attacked except by units with Flight or Reach). While this Mecha is in your graveyard, you may skip your draw step. If you do, return this Mecha from your graveyard to your hand.
